reviewText: I thought the video gave an opinion of a parnet who thought they were doing the right thing for their son and his friends sake. That they could have fun at home, but not behind the wheel. I viewed this with an open mind, but could not help that I personally would never let my child partied/drink as much as these kids did at one night after the prom, someone could have died or passed out from alcohol poisioning.everyone has their own opionion. I wished they could have shown some stats of drinking and driving in some states, and the severe consequences they would face.
